member.name: M:WebUtilities.IWebClient.GetAsync(System.Uri,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Send a GET request to the specified Uri as an asynchronous operation. If the server doesn't respond inside the provided timeout (milliseconds) or the provided CancellationToken is triggered, the operation is canceled.
member.exception: The provided Uri is null.
Thrown when the specified is less than 0.
Thrown when an error occurs in the web client or the request times out.
The provided cancellationToken was triggered.

member.summary: Returns the content of the response as a string asynchronously.

member.exception: Thrown when there is no content to read.

member.name: M:WebUtilities.IWebResponseContent.ReadAsFileAsync(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Writes the content of the response to a file.
member.exception: Thrown when the filename or response content are empty.
Thrown when there is no content to read or overwrite is false and the file already exists.
Thrown when the directory it's trying to save to doesn't exist.
Thrown when ContentLength is reported by the server and the file doesn't match it.
Thrown when there's a problem writing the file.
Thrown when the cancellationToken is triggered while downloading
